title: Thank You (CRS080)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Reggie Watts first shared on the podcast in August of 2012 about a mushroom trip with a friend.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Reggie Watts, Kevin Allison)
